overview: UFC 194: Aldo vs. McGregor was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on December 12, 2015 at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. The event was headlined by a UFC Featherweight Championship unification bout between then champion Jos√© Aldo and then interim champion Conor McGregor.
title: UFC 194: Aldo vs. McGregor
